## Depression Brain Scans: A Comprehensive How-To Guide

Depression is a prevalent mental health disorder that affects millions of people worldwide. While traditional methods of diagnosing depression rely on self-reported symptoms and clinical interviews, recent advances in neuroimaging technology have made it possible to visualize and measure brain activity associated with depression. This guide will walk you through the process of understanding depression brain scans, what you need for the procedure, and how to interpret the results.
